projects.title: Self-made letterloop
projects.description: This is a self-made version of the LetterLoop website. My friends and I have used it to keep in touch.

projects.title: Digit Recognizer
projects.description: A famous problem on kaggle, where we have to develop a machine learning model to recognize handwritten digits. I have used a feedforward neural network to achieve an accuracy of 92.8%.

projects.title: Simultaneous Equations Practice
projects.description: Developed for my tutee who is in high school, this website provides an infinite number of simultaneous equations practice problems as they are generated randomly.

projects.title: Reversi AI Web App
projects.description: Using python flask as the backend, I developed a web app where the user can play the 2-player board game Reversi against an AI of varying difficulty.

projects.title: Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma Tournament
projects.description: A multi-agent system where each agent participates in multiple rounds of the prisoner's dilemma. One of the agents use a reinforcement learning algorithm and can adapt its strategy based on the opponents' behaviours.

projects.title: HK Jockey Club AI
projects.description: The HKJC is a local horseracing competition. I'm currently working on an AI that can predict the results of each race using previous data.

projects.title: HKEX Web Scraper
projects.description: A simple web scraper that reads the data of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited and stores them in a csv file.

education.title: Imperial College London
education.description: I am currently enrolled in a MEng Computing course at Imperial College London. For my first year, I have achieved an A with an average score of 81.56%

education.title: Brighton College
education.description: I did boarding school in Brighton College during 2021-2023. During these 2 years, I completed my A-Levels acheiving an outstanding score of 5A*s.

education.title: Po Leung Kuk Choi Kai Yau School
education.description: PLKCKY is a school in Hong Kong. I had studied in this school for 10 years until 2021, and completed my IGCSEs, achieving 8A*s and 2As.

work.title: ASTRI
work.description: ASTRI, short for Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute. I took part in a 7-week internship in 2024, and I worked on an existing MTR rail intruction detection system, improving its original speed by 15%.

extra.title: Hong Kong Children's Choir
extra.description: I have joined HKCC since a young age, and I have performed with them overseas multiple times, including Finland, Estonia and various cities in mainland China.
